thread.title: MischaB
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by MischaB

author: MischaB
title: MischaB
text:
Was looking on the HZ website for bedroom furniture and went to the store to see if I could find it. While they didn't have that particular bed on the Floor, Heath helped me to find something similar that was even better. He has many years sales experience from a local high end store so I knew he knew his business.
They delivered it today and its even more beautiful in my Room than on the floor.
Will use Home Zone again!
